channel.title: CVE Feed for Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- MELIPC Series MI5122-VW
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- MELIPC Series MI5122-VW

item.title: CVE-2024-3904|2024-07-23T00:28:13.328Z -- mitsubishi%20electric%20corporation -- melipc%20series%20mi5122-vw
item.description: Incorrect Default Permissions vulnerability in Smart Device Communication Gateway preinstalled on MELIPC Series MI5122-VW firmware versions "05" to "07" allows a local attacker to execute arbitrary code by saving a malicious file to a specific folder. As a result, the attacker may disclose, tamper with, destroy or delete information in the product, or cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition on the product.
